Key Match Events: The New York Yankees won the doubleheader against the Boston Red Sox, with a final score of 4-1 in Game 2.
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Boone, the manager of the New York Yankees, achieved his 500th win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees are back above.500 and are no longer alone at the bottom of the AL East.
Others: The game was played at Fenway Park, with an attendance of 30,392.
